name: ◯
description:
WIP audio toy

You get 4 rings (audio voices) to make a short loop

Loops can be saved and loaded

Control: mouse left place note mouse right remove note shift lock pitch shift+up pitch + shift+down pitch - scroll adjust bpm scroll+shift adjust beat count space play/stop ctrl+l load tune ctrl+s save tune tab change color 1-4 change ring

Certain features may still be missing due to the toy's WIP state
